title: Can't Download PBE
body: I'm already accepted into it but I can't re-download it. I've recently got a new PC and I heard it was closed for signing up but I got accepted.

replies.body: You shouldn't have any problems downloading the PBE Client [**here**](http://l3cdn.riotgames.com/PBE/LOLPBE.zip), but hit me back up if you run into any issues!
